languages.text: "Я все еще не могу поверить, что Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} взять в свиту этого... этого..."
"I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."
languages.original_text: "Я все еще не могу поверить, что Лорд-капитан решил{mf||а} взять в свиту этого... этого..."

traits.locale_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

traits.locale_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

languages.text: “我还是不敢相信，舰长大人居然决定让这个……这个……东西加入{mf|他的|她的}随行人员之中。”
languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

traits.locale_text: “我还是不敢相信，舰长大人居然决定让这个……这个……东西加入{mf|他的|她的}随行人员之中。”
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: « Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ait décidé d'accepter cette... chose dans son entourage. »
languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

traits.locale_text: « Je n'arrive toujours pas à croire que {mf|le seigneur-capitaine|la seigneure-capitaine} ait décidé d'accepter cette... chose dans son entourage. »
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: «Sigo sin poder creerme que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán haya aceptado a este... a esta... cosa en su séquito».
languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

traits.locale_text: «Sigo sin poder creerme que {mf|el|la} Lord Capitán haya aceptado a este... a esta... cosa en su séquito».
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: 「未だに信じられません。ロード・キャプテンがこんな…このような…ものを仲間にする決断をくだすとは」
languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

traits.locale_text: 「未だに信じられません。ロード・キャプテンがこんな…このような…ものを仲間にする決断をくだすとは」
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.text: "Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass der Lord Captain entschieden hat, dieses ... dieses ... Ding in sein Gefolge aufzunehmen."
languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Ich kann noch immer nicht glauben, dass der Lord Captain entschieden hat, dieses ... dieses ... Ding in sein Gefolge aufzunehmen."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion

languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

languages.text: "Lord Kaptan'ın bu... Bu şeyi maiyetine almaya karar verdiğine hâlâ inanamıyorum."
languages.original_text: "I still cannot believe the Lord Captain has decided to take this... this... thing into {mf|his|her} retinue."

traits.locale_text: "Lord Kaptan'ın bu... Bu şeyi maiyetine almaya karar verdiğine hâlâ inanamıyorum."
traits.speaker: AbelardCompanion
